name: Fyd
summary: Plunge into the world where heroes always die, and villains triumph! Kill people who try to protect the good and stand in the way of achieving the goal of your whole life – to take over the world! But it’s rather difficult to subjugate even some pathetic country just by yourself...

name: Fyz and Now in Olympic Games of Tartarus
summary: A puzzle + roguelite game, now with a web version!

name: Fynite
summary: Welcome to Fynite, a backrooms horror / thriller game. You've noclipped into the backrooms getting out isn't likely, do you have what it takes?

name: Fydo's Magic Tiles
summary: Fydo's Magic Tiles is a match-four action puzzle game for Game Boy and compatible systems. Match at least 4 tiles vertical or horizontal and clear them from the board. Pop magic bubbles with a match right next to them. Match 6 or more to start a combo, and keep matching to get bonus stars! Find and unlock all 17 Star Tiles to complete the game.

name: Fynn's Passage
summary: Play as "Fynn" as you make your way through an underground labyrinth, fighting against mobs of malicious creatures. Switch between weapons seamlessly for balanced combat. Explore caverns, discover collectible items, trade with friendly NPCs, and solve various puzzles.

name: Fyte
summary: Fyte is a Twitch-Integrated game made for streamers and their viewers. Up to 500 viewers can !play and !attack each other while their bot-controlled avatars battle it out across multiple maps and game modes.

name: FYR: The Lost Island
summary: FYR: The Lost Island is a psychological VR horror game that plunges you into the mystery of an abandoned island. Navigate haunting environments, evade a relentless monster, and use light to uncover hidden stories that piece together the island’s tragic history.

name: Fyrardien
summary: After a fateful discovery, our hero and their new companions embark on a challenging journey through unknown lands. Are they the last hope for their world? And could these new companions become more than just friends? The choice is yours, young Guardian...
